body: At 6th level, you can use the Disable Device and Sleight of Hand skills at a range of 30 feet. Working at a distance increases the normal skill check DC by 5, and you cannot take 10 on this check. Any object to be manipulated must weigh 5 pounds or less. You can only use this ability if you have at least 1 rank in the skill being used.
name: Ranged Legerdemain
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Animal and Terrain Domains/Monkey Domain/Ranged Legerdemain
